item.description:
The Humane Society of the United States is hosting a free grassroots meeting on
Monday, October 18th, where participants will learn how to make
a tremendous difference for animals in Maine.

As the Maine State Director of The Humane Society of the United States and a York County native, I am excited to meet animal advocates across the state. Please attend this meeting to become part of a grassroots movement for animal protection in Maine. At this meeting we will talk about animal protection projects, current events, and immediate ways to take action for the animals in Maine.
Please attend this meeting and don't forget to invite your friends!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the Assembly Room.

group.name: The Maine Animal Welfare Meetup Group

item.name: Animal Welfare Meet-Up in Calais
